channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: This is the America Newt Gingrich built. https://t.co/SoNyk7iI8o
Seconded. https://t.co/o58NxX1IgM
What if Ayn Rand was actually a Communist agent sent to destroy America through her hyper capitalism? https://t.co/SahdBu4JHe

Finally, an anti-gun song from @DanBernHQ that’s not a tearjerker. https://t.co/TXVxFTVDu6
As opposed to this one, which is. https://t.co/FqYPpj6CFU
@RokhlK What is ZTK?
@DBashIdeas Which my one-time Zohar hevrusa @kavvanah of course read and passed on to me.
"This Old Man: Rough and Rowdy Days, Shadow Kingdom, and the 2022 Tour show Bob Dylan writing (and rewriting) for his elderly vocal range -- and perspective." Has anybody written this essay yet?
Your occasional reminder that AIPAC is helping elect the Republican congressmen who enabled this slaughter. https://t.co/k7NuLpBQqg
@DandiaAsad “Or you could be honest and say, ‘A Republican named Newt Gingrich saw a wedge issue and ran with it.’”
@c_o_bernstein Well, actually. https://t.co/v7N9NPp7x1
@swordsjew Sounds feline but ok.
@WatergateDayOf @SpiroAgnewGhost Shouldn’t there also be a Oval Office Day of account, tweeting out excerpts of that day’s transcripts?
@prof_goldberg Case name itself sounds like a hate crime.

@froomkin The Sulzbergers are probably the most liberal people in their social circle. And the execs who buy ads are probably not liberal.
@froomkin They can’t alienate the half of the age-and-wealth demographic that identify as Republican.

@ljordanplatt @froomkin I’m happy you’re telling them that!
@ljordanplatt @froomkin But even more importantly, whatever the owner’s politics, they don’t want to anger threat Republicans in their own social circle, among their advertisers, and their subscribers.
@trekonomics For some people it’s always 1945.
Some theology in memory of former NCSY and OU leader Rabbi Pinchas Stolper https://t.co/LMadGRY6ff

@HeerJeet Military “respect the gun” discipline is real an effective. I got a bit second hand from my dad. It won’t stop the killer with a rifle, perhaps, but would prevent all the kids killed in handgun “accidents.”
@HeerJeet I suspect that most military veterans with kids are horrified by this picture. https://t.co/c9soB9lXtf

@DandiaAsad 2 million people. Is there a single daily paper?
@DandiaAsad Time to buy the rights for the Daily Eagle from the heirs of Meir Kahane.
@GershomG Lots of “accidental” gun tragedies here that wouldn’t happen if the gun owners had first been indoctrinated into military discipline of proper gun respect.
@GershomG @yasmingorenberg 70s-style color grading! You raised her well!
